creator: zhjicheng@yahoo.com
text:
System clipboard will be cleared when I left clicks on the canvas.  Please 
check that. I'll be highly appreciated if you could keep me update on this 
issue.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
This was fixed yesterday in CVS.
If you are not comfortable with CVS we also make
nightly dumps of CVS available as a zip.
If this does not resolve the issue for you
please reopen the bug.
